Vital Signs Bar

The Vital Signs bar displays the most recent data for up to six real-time variables, highlighting in red any values that are within the alert range. The bar also shows the current Real-Time Data Interval at the top and, if configured, the patient’s fluid balance. The fluid balance is useful in perioperative environments.

This accessory is only available at bedside workstations.

 

 

How to...

l Choose what to display on the Vital Signs bar
